game.name: Grim Dawn - Forgotten Gods Expansion
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Forgotten Gods takes the apocalyptic fantasy world of Grim Dawn to distant lands with a massive new chapter in humanity’s struggle against otherworldly and divine threats. Unleash new mobility powers, gather powerful new items and venture into a brand-new game mode with endless replayability.
